problems.description: Invalid package versions (pytest==0.0.1, requests==0.0.1) causing installation failures
Incorrect test assertion in test_multiply, expected 6 but asserted 5
Logs directory not created before writing log file, causing potential path errors
Version conflicts with globally installed pytest plugins, preventing test execution
Deploy folder C:\FakeDeployFolder does not exist, causing xcopy to fail
Incorrect dist directory path in xcopy command, should be dist\* instead of ..\dist\*
